snippet: People will be allowed to have guns in school parking lots under a proposal that won approval in the Indiana General Assembly.
abstract: People will be allowed to have guns in school parking lots under proposal approved in Indiana General Assembly; supporters say policy will protect parents from unknowingly committing a felony if they bring guns with them when picking up their children but critics say access to guns near schools can make school shootings more likely.
lead_paragraph: People will be allowed to have guns in school parking lots under a proposal that won approval in the Indiana General Assembly.

headline.main: Indiana: Measure to Allow Guns in School Lots Advances to Governor
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Measure to Allow Guns in School Lots Advances to Governor

keywords.value: Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America
keywords.name: organizations
